page.title: 02Getting up on a school day
page.content: Sometimes my mum,my brother,or my sister wakes me up and I sometimes wake up naturally.I get dressed ready for School and I draw the curtains open and make my bed and pick up my School bag and I hurry downstairs. Sometimes when I get downstairs I either make my mum a cup of tea, sometimes I make my sandwiches,and sometimes I get straight on with my breakfast.I either have Cornflakes, Alpen, Rice Krispies, or Frosties.I also have a cup of tea and sometimes a glass of orange juice. I usually get up at 7.30am, 7.15am or 7.45am. It depends. After breakfast I brush my teeth, wash my face and brush my hair.
